title: Porter scam
selftext:
My friend's family send his phone from via porter and  instead of sending the phone and the porter has replaced the phone with a soap midway.
This is utterly shameless and the customer care is saying that this is related with other team and they are not responding
comments:
Truly outrageous! He should have put at least two soaps for the cost of the phone.  

1. Name the porter and shame away. 
2. Raise compliant in consumer forum.
